Title: Extends certain provisions relating to relocation and employment assistance credits
Summary: Extends certain provisions relating to relocation and employment assistance credits until July 1, 2025.
LawCode: Amd §§25-z & 25-ee, Gen City L; amd §§22-622 & 22-624, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general city law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to extending certain provisions relating to relocation and employment assistance credits
